trans-unit.source: Dependencies
trans-unit.target: 依赖性

trans-unit.source: Error codes produces by the synthesizer are defined in include/LithUSS_Error.h so if you need more info on the error you're getting check that file.
trans-unit.target: 合成器产生的错误代码在 include/LithUSS_Error.h 中定义， 因此，如果您需要有关错误的更多信息，请检查该文件。

trans-unit.source: For this package (liepa-tts) to work you need synthesizer binaries which you'll have to compile yourself.
trans-unit.target: 为了使这个软件包(liepa-tts)工作,你需要自己编译合成器二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: I highly recommend Poetry
trans-unit.target: 我强烈推荐诗歌

trans-unit.source: If you must, use pip:
trans-unit.target: 如果你一定要用pip。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: LIEPA
trans-unit.target: LIEPA

trans-unit.source: Lietuvių šneka valdomos paslaugos (Lithuanian speech controlled services)
trans-unit.target: Lietuviųšnekavaldomos paslaugos（立陶宛语语音控制服务）

trans-unit.source: Notes:
trans-unit.target: 注:

trans-unit.source: Once you build binaries from the native-modules subtree make sure they are available on LIBRARY_PATH (for building) and LD_LIBRARY_PATH (for runtime).
trans-unit.target: 一旦你从native-modules子树中构建了二进制文件,确保它们在LIBRARY_PATH(用于构建)和LD_LIBRARY_PATH(用于运行时)中可用。

trans-unit.source: Python bindings for Lithuanian language synthesizer from LIEPA project
trans-unit.target: LIEPA项目中立陶宛语合成器的Python绑定。

trans-unit.source: The .wav produce by the synthesizer is completely unoptimized and contains a lot of silence. Therefor you should further process it before usage.
trans-unit.target: 合成器产生的 .wav 完全没有优化，并且包含很多静音。因此，您应在使用前对其进行进一步处理。

trans-unit.source: The files that must be present in data/ directory are:
trans-unit.target: 在 data/ 目录中必须存在的文件是：

trans-unit.source: The original sources can be acquired here
trans-unit.target: 原始资源可以在这里获取

trans-unit.source: This package wraps the latter.
trans-unit.target: 这套方案包装了后者。

trans-unit.source: This project aims to provide high quality digital Lithuanian speech services for free. So far there are several services provided at various stages of completeness, such as Lithuanian speech recognizer and Lithuanian speech synthesizer.
trans-unit.target: 该项目旨在免费提供高质量的数字立陶宛语语音服务。到目前为止,已经提供了一些处于不同阶段的服务,如立陶宛语语音识别器和立陶宛语语音合成器。

trans-unit.source: To make it easier to build binaries for platforms other than Windows you can acquire fixed-up sources here: laba-diena-tts
trans-unit.target: 为了更轻松地为Windows以外的平台构建二进制文件，您可以在此处获取固定源：laba-diena-tts

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: You can acquire the data files along with original sources here
trans-unit.target: 您可以在此处获取数据文件以及原始资源

trans-unit.source: You need numpy available for building C extension, so if you get errors first install that:
trans-unit.target: 你需要numpy可用来构建C扩展,所以如果你得到的错误首先安装它。

trans-unit.source: You should extract voice directories unmodified.
trans-unit.target: 你应该不加修改地提取语音目录。
